summary: Use this API to get detailed information of the specified products
description: Use this API to get detailed information of the specified products.

query.name: filter
query.description: Returns the products with the status matching this parameter. Possible values are all, live, inactive, deleted, pending, rejected, sold-out. Mandatory.

query.name: update_before
query.description: Limits the returned product list to those updated before or on a specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

query.name: create_before
query.description: Limits the returned products to those created before or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

query.name: offset
query.description: Deprecated(The number of Items you want to skip before you start counting),It is recommended to use date for scrolling query.The maximum offset is 10000

query.name: create_after
query.description: Limits the returned products to those created after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

query.name: update_after
query.description: Limits the returned products to those updated after or on the specified date, given in ISO 8601 date format. Optional

query.name: limit
query.description: The number of Items you would like to fetch from every response,The maximum is 50.

query.name: options
query.description: This value can be used to get more stock information. e.g., Options=1 means contain ReservedStock, RtsStock, PendingStock, RealTimeStock, FulfillmentBySellable.

query.name: sku_seller_list
query.description: Only products that have the Seller SKU in this list will be returned. Input should be a JSON array. For example, ["Apple 6S Gold", "Apple 6S Black"]. It only matches the whole words. A maximum of 100 SKUs can be returned.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/products/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("filter", "live")
request.add_api_parameter("update_before", "2018-01-01T00:00:00+0800")
request.add_api_parameter("create_before", "2018-01-01T00:00:00+0800")
request.add_api_parameter("offset", "0")
request.add_api_parameter("create_after", "2010-01-01T00:00:00+0800")
request.add_api_parameter("update_after", "2010-01-01T00:00:00+0800")
request.add_api_parameter("limit", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("options", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("sku_seller_list", " [\"39817:01:01\", \"Apple 6S Black\"]")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/products/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('filter', 'live')
request.add_api_param('update_before', '2018-01-01T00:00:00+0800')
request.add_api_param('create_before', '2018-01-01T00:00:00+0800')
request.add_api_param('offset', '0')
request.add_api_param('create_after', '2010-01-01T00:00:00+0800')
request.add_api_param('update_after', '2010-01-01T00:00:00+0800')
request.add_api_param('limit', '10')
request.add_api_param('options', '1')
request.add_api_param('sku_seller_list', ' [\"39817:01:01\", \"Apple 6S Black\"]')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: The request URL is not valid.
The value for the offset parameter is not valid.
The date format is not valid.
The value for the limit parameter is not valid.
The specified status filter is not valid.

error_codes.message: E070: You have corrupt data in your sku seller list.
error_codes.description: Data in the SKU list are not valid.
Failed to get the product information.

error_codes.message: E901: The request is too frequent, or the requested functionality is temporarily disabled.
error_codes.description: Failed to return the requested data due to high calling frequency or disabled functionality. Please try again later.

error_codes.message: Limit service request speed in server side temporarily.
error_codes.description: API level QPS limiting flow, please retry in the next second when you encounter this error.

error_codes.message: Seller not verified,please check seller status
error_codes.description: The seller's store opening process has not been completed, please log in to the Seller Center, check the store information that needs to be improved on the home page and submit it for review.

error_codes.message: Limit service request speed in server side temporarily.
error_codes.description: API level QPS limiting flow, please retry in the next second when you encounter this error.
The limit field value is incorrect and should not exceed a maximum of 50.
